ch0011_10_homika/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been looking
forward to our jam session!
ch0011_10_homika/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m ready to go! Let’s rock the audience right outta
their seats!
ch0011_10_homika/7101_0701_01_10:
My live shows get real flashy when I have help
from electric Pokémon!
ch0011_10_homika/7101_0701_02_10:
I better level up my music so I don’t get beat by
amped-up machines and lighting!
ch0011_10_homika/7102_0701_01_10:
I wonder if I could form a band that uses
Pokémon moves?
ch0011_10_homika/7102_0701_02_10:
Like Sing, Bug Buzz, Hyper Voice, and Disarming
Voice!
ch0011_10_homika/7102_0701_03_10: It’d make for a toxic performance, don’t ya think?
ch0011_10_homika/7103_0701_01_10:
Whaddya think about adding your Pokémon to my
band as a supporting member?
ch0011_10_homika/7103_0701_02_10:
Your Pokémon and my Toxtricity could have an
ultrapassionate jam session and make some
new tunes!
ch0011_10_homika/7104_0701_01_10:
I know it’s not always easy to follow through with
the things you like and the things you wanna do...
ch0011_10_homika/7104_0701_02_10:
But I made a promise to my soul to never lose to
anyone when it comes to my band and
my Pokémon!
ch0011_10_homika/7104_0701_03_10: Without causing trouble for others, of course!
ch0011_10_homika/7105_0701_01_10:
Being on Pasio means that my songs can reach
people from other regions!
ch0011_10_homika/7105_0701_02_10:
Next up are my Pokémon battle skills! I’ll show
everyone everything there is to know about me!
ch0011_10_homika/7105_0701_03_10:
It might be good for you to be a little greedy
sometimes too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0011_10_homika/1701_0702_01_10:
With a heart like yours, you’ll have no problem
using it well!
ch0011_10_homika/2501_0701_01_10:
The tunes my Toxtricity plays go perfectly with
my songs!
ch0011_10_homika/2501_0701_02_10:
For my new song, I’ll bring Toxtricity to
the forefront...
ch0011_10_homika/2501_0701_03_10:
and play some poisonous beats that’ll flow all the
way to your heart!
ch0011_10_homika/2501_0702_01_10: Go all-out at my next live show in the front row!
ch0011_10_homika/2501_0702_02_10:
I’ll paralyze you with my music and make you lose
your senses!
ch0011_10_homika/2511_0701_01_10:
I express everything I wanna say through my
songs and Pokémon battles!
ch0011_10_homika/2511_0701_02_10:
People receive my messages a lot stronger in their
hearts that way than with words! That’s my belief!
ch0011_10_homika/2511_0702_01_10:
When you wanna express something, you gotta be
true to yourself.
ch0011_10_homika/2511_0702_02_10:
You better stand your ground and stick to your
beliefs! That’s what makes you strong!
ch0011_10_homika/3001_0701_01_10:
To do everything you want, you gotta wake
up early!
ch0011_10_homika/3003_0701_01_10: What’s that? You say you wanna hear me play?!
ch0011_10_homika/3005_0701_01_10:
You all right? It’s pretty late. Even I don’t make
much noise at night.
